mapper.select: SELECT problem_id, subject, haeseol, problem_text, ans_1, ans_2, ans_3, ans_4, FROM problems WHERE problem_id = #{problemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROBLEMS ( problem_id, subject, haeseol, problem_text, ans_1, ans_2, ans_3, ans_4, ans_correct ) VALUES ( PROBLEM_SEQ.nextval, #{subject}, #{haeseol}, #{problem_text}, #{ans_1}, #{ans_2}, #{ans_3}, #{ans_4}, #{ans_correct} )
